Eligibility Criteria.UG_admission: Pass in 10+2/Pre-University Course/equivalent course recognized by Bangalore University

Karnataka Students: Class X or SSLC Marks Card
PUC or +2 or Class XII or Equivalent Marks Card (I & II Year)
Conduct Certificate from the Head of the Institution last attended
Passport size photographs in formal dress - 06
Non-Karnataka Students: Class X or SSLC Marks Card
PUC or +2 or Class XII or Equivalent Marks Card (I & II Year)
Conduct Certificate from the Head of the Institution last attended
Passport size photographs in formal dress - 06
Foreign Students: Mark Statements of respective country equivalent to Higher Secondary
Conduct Certificate from the Head of the Institution last attended
Copy of passport attested by Gazetted Officer

Important Conditions.Presence of student and guardian: The Applicant should be personally present for Admission along with the Parent / Guardian
Important Conditions.Original documents required: Candidates must submit all original documents and copies
Important Conditions.University approval required: Final Admission is subject to the University's approval

Document Submission.Originals, copies, and application form: At the time of admission, candidates must submit all original documents, copies, and a hard copy of the completed application form
Document Submission.Return policy for original documents: Original documents will be returned only after the university registration or at the end of the program. Students must produce the acknowledgment receipt to retrieve the documents

Selection Process.Merit-based: Admission will be on merit. No recommendations will be entertained

BCom & TT.title: Bachelor of Commerce (BCom)
BCom & TT.overview: BCom (Regular) or Bachelor of Commerce is a three-year undergraduate course (four-year for BCom Honours) that trains students for several job profiles. Candidates are taught core subjects related to commerce and finance. The program is spread over six semesters (or eight semesters for Honours). Graduates can pursue careers in finance, accounting, or higher education.

program_details.eligibility: Pass in 10+2/Pre-University Course/equivalent course recognized by Bangalore University
